duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain effective communication channels with hiring managers and business leadership.
Identify and execute steps for internal career advancement and succession planning.
Develop and execute the company's diversity recruitment strategy to support compliance objectives.
Establish relationships with colleges, universities, and professional organizations to attract diverse candidates.
Support affirmative action team to complete timely submissions of affirmative action plan.
Maintain strict confidentiality and demonstrate exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.
Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and maintain a high level of quality in recruitment administrative processes.
Build good working relationships with recruitment agencies and contract staffing companies.
Exhibit a strong sense of urgency to meet the organization's staffing needs.
Exercise full discretionary authority to assign work to recruitment staff and work independently to deliver work products against aggressive deadlines.
Work with creativity and latitude to meet goals and objectives, relying on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, HR, Organizational Development, or related field (Master's preferred)
